name: The Room Lord
description:
You are trapped in a strange building a set of rooms where each floor offers rewards with obstacles waiting for you at every turn.

You need to get out this is room lord.

Also it mentions in the instructions to press esc to escape DON'T PRESS IT HERE that's for the desktop version only on the web browser version it will freeze the game i didn't know about this the only time to press the Esc key is to exit full screen mode.
